title: China central bank official says commercial banks should step up blockchain application
text:
China central bank official says commercial banks should step up blockchain application

Cryptocurrency News 7 minutes ago (Oct 27, 2019 11:07PM ET)

SHANGHAI (Reuters) - Commercial banks should step up their application of blockchain technology to embrace digital finance, a Chinese central bank official said on Monday. Li Wei, head of the People's Bank of China's technology department, made the comments at a forum in Shanghai. Last week, Chinese President Xi Jinping said the country's development of blockchain technology should be sped up.
